about_the_game:
"Dungeon of Memories" is an immersive, narrative-driven adventure game. In this hauntingly beautiful world, players take on the role of a young protagonist who, upon falling into a coma, descends into the depths of the memory-consuming dungeon. With little recollection of the former life, the player must battle through a labyrinth where holds the lost fragments of the past, the dungeon's setting and plots.

As players venture deeper into the dungeon, they encounter a myriad of creatures – some hostile, others more enigmatic. Interaction with unique non-player characters (NPCs) is crucial as they provide clues, side quests, and insights that propel the game forward, aiding players in piecing together the narrative puzzle of the protagonist's life, the setting of the dungeon and stories.

Features:

Plot-based Progression System: Reclaim scattered memories, settings, or plots to unlock new abilities, story arcs, and pathways within the dungeon.

Intricate Storytelling: Each interaction and battle reveals more of the protagonist's past, leading to a deeply personal gaming experience.

Dynamic Combat: Engage in battles with an array of creatures, each demanding a different approach.

Unique NPCs: Forge alliances, communicate, or fight against memorable characters that can change your journey.

Visually Striking Environments: Explore a dungeon where beauty and danger intertwine, featuring hauntingly detailed art and atmospheric lighting effects.

Choices Matter: Make decisions that will lead to different course of journey.

With scant memories left, An 18-year-old fall into this Dungeon through coma, faces challenges to piece together his past, battling creatures, interact with unique NPCs, each memory reclaimed a victory in the hauntingly fascinating dungeon.
